name: Dark road
description:
In the psychological horror game Dark Road, you embark on a chilling trip inside the head of a character who is suffering from mental illness. You play the part of the main character, who is battling his own worries and concerns, in this game. Your objective in the game is to drive through the scary woodland and confront your nightmares.

The road gets trickier and the obstacles more difficult as you advance through the game. With its heavy fog, unsettling sounds, and distorted sights, the setting is meant to be disturbing. In order to keep the player on edge, the game also utilises jump scares and other horror tropes.

You'll come across a variety of objects in the game that stand in for various aspects of the main character's mentality. 

Mental illness is one of the game's major topics, and it is treated delicately and sensitively in the game. The game challenges players to reflect critically on their own notions of mental health by delving deeply into the main character's issues with anxiety and terror.

An exciting and thought-provoking game, Dark Road forces players to face their fears and delve into their own brains. If you enjoy playing horror games with interesting psychological themes, then this is a game you won't want to miss.
